title: Customer Service Practical Competency Enhancement: Collaborative Learning-Based Co-Created Music Curriculum Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: A music curriculum design plan reflecting cross-school collaboration methods can be created.

Learners can analyze the characteristics (learning motivation, preferred activities, comprehension levels) of three learner types (non-majors/explorers/hobby learners) within a week, create a 3-page lesson plan including two customized activities per type (e.g., gamified tasks, project-based learning), and receive over 80% positive feedback (average 4/5 or higher) from peer reviews.
Project-based assessment tools can be developed to measure learners’ musical growth.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
